name: Angry Elja
description:
Help miner Angry Elja clear out his mine in this puzzle game! Pick up your pickaxe and dig through the tunnels into the depth of his mine by solving tons of puzzles along the way.

Angry Elja starts with 45 challenging levels, with more to come!

This game features fun and challenging puzzles for all ages, with each level it's own achievement badges to earn. A throwback to well-known puzzle games like Boulder Dash and Dig Dug.
